WRITING.TITLE: Flat Earthers are Even Nuttier Than I Thought!

WRITING.TEXT: first of all, any so called scientific article that starts off by bombarding me with ads I'm immediately skeptical of. Second, I'm not well versed in gravity but I educated myself enough to know that the writer of this article could benefit from the same education simply by youtubing "how does gravity work" and that's at least most of the questions the author ask answered right there.
it's not just this, I make videos on a whole range of topics. This is just simply one of them.
